channel.title: Need help 317 will rep

public int master = 0

and

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1 && master = 0) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you've successfuly cheated... noob."); master = 1 } else { sendMessage("You have already been maxed out!");

item.title: Need help 317 will rep
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It will keep going until it reaches 100 in a skill.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 24, 2009, 10:33:29 pm[/size][hr] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 100; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 0; }

Do i change the return;100 to 99?
